```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(corrplot)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv("data.csv")
head(data)

#correlation plot
numeric_data <- data[, sapply(data, is.numeric)]
matrix <- cor(numeric_data)
corrplot(matrix, method = "color")
```
